None.Name: Rock Shot
None.Description: Every second, tower shoots bouncing rocks that deal 36 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 54 in total. Affects air targets only.

None.Name: Blessed Gravity Surge
None.Description: Active to tear a flying enemy down to the ground. The caught flying will then be enchained to the ground for 15 seconds and can no longer move. Ground units will be able to attack it while it is bound. Reusable every 30 seconds.
